title: Provisional programme of work of the Sixth Committee for the eighty-first session

Eightieth session 
Sixth Committee 
Agenda item 121 
Revitalization of the work of the General Assembly 
 
 
 
 
Under agenda item 121, “Revitalization of the work of the General Assembly”, 
pursuant to paragraph 3 (b) of the annex to General Assembly resolution 58/316, each 
Main Committee shall adopt a provisional programme of work for the next session. 
Accordingly, the Bureau of the Sixth Committee has prepared a provisional 
programme of work for the eighty-first session of the Assembly.  
 
 
 
Draft decision 
 
 
 
 Provisional programme of work of the Sixth Committee for the 
eighty-first session 
 
 
 
The General Assembly notes that the Sixth Committee has decided to adopt the 
following provisional programme of work for the eighty-first session of the Assembly, 
as proposed by the Bureau:
